"Unlocking Normal Classes' Level Cap to:
"・Level 90 must be unlocked separately for each class.

・The administrator, Koffie, has a Client Order for each class, and completing one of those Client Orders will allow you to raise that class to level 90."

"The Client Orders require you to obtain the following Title:

・\"Creator of Solid Defense\"
Equip a ★12+ Arm, Leg, and Rear Unit
each with a grind value of +10.

※Titles can be obtained at the Title Counter
※The Title can be obtained even if you have not accepted one of these Client Orders
※If you already have the Title, the Client Order will be completed immediately"
